body:
Comment 3: 
OK. That was also my assumption.

I share you concerns, and I think others might also against doing
any more work on the C compiler.

However, if it's pretty easy to fix, then I think we can give it a try.
I also have plan to make use of the Plan 9 C compiler in the Go
toolchain to do something else (build sqlite, to be specific so that
we can have a non-cgo version of sqlite)
Perhaps I should just defer that project until Russ has done his
C->Go translator, and hack on that instead.
